```{r set-up, echo = T, message = F, warning = F, include=F}  
library(dplyr)
library(corrplot)
```

```{r read_data, echo=TRUE}
data <- read.csv("processed_merged_carparks.csv", header = T)
data <- data[data$lotType == "C", ] 
data <- data[-c(1,3:5,8:12,14,28:29)]
```

# Feature Selection
## Correlation plots
```{r correlation plot, echo = F, eval=T}
# Correlation plot
res <- cor(data)
corrplot(res, method="number",number.cex = 0.4, tl.cex = 0.5)
data <- data[-c(4,16)]
```
